channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）

item.title: ADORATE（新規追加）
item.description: Take the role of an evil god amassing a cult of followers, build their town, and defend them from incoming holy forces!
item.content:encoded:
Take the role of an evil god amassing a cult of followers, build their town, and defend them from incoming holy forces!

item.title: Skull8（新規追加）
item.description: Explore a labyrinth of procedurally generated levels in search of mysterious fragments and eight forgotten relics. Death means starting over, but knowledge is your greatest weapon.
item.content:encoded:
Explore a labyrinth of procedurally generated levels in search of mysterious fragments and eight forgotten relics. Death means starting over, but knowledge is your greatest weapon.

item.title: 夏のさいかい‐in lost summer- a Demo（新規追加）
item.description: 「夏のさいかい‐in lost summer- a」の体験版です。 全５章のうち４章（役１０万字）までプレイ可能です！ 青春の「一夏」の物語。 ヒロインとの交流の先に待ち受ける運命を見届けてください！
item.content:encoded:
「夏のさいかい‐in lost summer- a」の体験版です。 全５章のうち４章（役１０万字）までプレイ可能です！ 青春の「一夏」の物語。 ヒロインとの交流の先に待ち受ける運命を見届けてください！

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Bottom elites（新規追加）
item.description: This is an adventure game that won't require you to start from scratch, but there's a possibility of falling to the bottom, so it's a great way to exercise your mindset.Players need to use their brains to solve puzzles, and there are multiple levels with different styles inside
item.content:encoded:
This is an adventure game that won't require you to start from scratch, but there's a possibility of falling to the bottom, so it's a great way to exercise your mindset.Players need to use their brains to solve puzzles, and there are multiple levels with different styles inside

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Heavenly Book（新規追加）
item.description: The Book of Heaven — Your Destiny, Your Path A regular office worker stumbles into The Book of Heaven. Explore vast lands, face trials, and uncover your destiny. Your choices shape your future — hero or villain, light or shadow. An epic journey awaits. The Book of Heaven is open — destiny awaits.
item.content:encoded:
The Book of Heaven — Your Destiny, Your Path A regular office worker stumbles into The Book of Heaven. Explore vast lands, face trials, and uncover your destiny. Your choices shape your future — hero or villain, light or shadow. An epic journey awaits. The Book of Heaven is open — destiny awaits.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Dust & Dice（新規追加）
item.description: Dust & Dice is a mix of a roguelike deck builder and a Wild West-style dice game. Build your deck and roll the dice to determine your fate. Use strategic cards and poker-inspired dice combinations to survive challenging turn-based duels.
item.content:encoded:
Dust & Dice is a mix of a roguelike deck builder and a Wild West-style dice game. Build your deck and roll the dice to determine your fate. Use strategic cards and poker-inspired dice combinations to survive challenging turn-based duels.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Until The Hero（新規追加）
item.description: Transform a simple farmer into a legendary hero with the magic of a loop! Farm endlessly and grow stronger than the Demon King. Combine items to grow stronger even faster! Write your own legendary tale with the power granted by the Goddess!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Mona:The Endless Journey（新規追加）
item.description: *Mona: The Endless Journey* is a 3D side-scrolling action RPG. Players play a fragile pillow-carrying girl, adventuring in a fantasy continent. They rescue powerful companions, traverse mysteries, solve puzzles, fight eerie creatures, and uncover the world’s hidden truth.
item.content:encoded:
*Mona: The Endless Journey* is a 3D side-scrolling action RPG. Players play a fragile pillow-carrying girl, adventuring in a fantasy continent. They rescue powerful companions, traverse mysteries, solve puzzles, fight eerie creatures, and uncover the world’s hidden truth.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Oiran Survival: Edo Yokai Rush（新規追加）
item.description: Set in the dazzling Edo red-light district, courtesan Kochou faces relentless yokai in this action RPG. Cut down hundreds of foes, rescue the Twelve Zodiac Children, and battle mighty bosses. Enjoy fast-paced stages and a dark Japanese fantasy world in 3D and Live2D.
item.content:encoded:
Set in the dazzling Edo red-light district, courtesan Kochou faces relentless yokai in this action RPG. Cut down hundreds of foes, rescue the Twelve Zodiac Children, and battle mighty bosses. Enjoy fast-paced stages and a dark Japanese fantasy world in 3D and Live2D.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Lazy Witch's Factory（新規追加）
item.description: Factory builder and Rogue-lite are combined to new game. Summon familiars as worker and develop the production line on retro European style fantasy world. Stack synergy for mass production and repay the debt to win. In the hell ruled by capitalism, enjoy the amusing jokes exchanged by cute girls.

Factory builder and Rogue-lite are combined to new game. Summon familiars as worker and develop the production line on retro European style fantasy world. Stack synergy for mass production and repay the debt to win. In the hell ruled by capitalism, enjoy the amusing jokes exchanged by cute girls.

item.title: Funbag Fantasy 4（新規追加）
item.description: 400 years earlier than the events of the 1st game, the Kingdom of Litovia was bordered by two powers, both of which put great pressure on the kingdom. They've ordered the monasteries near the border to organize their own garrisons to defend themselves, and Astor was among the monks who lived there.

item.title: KillCam FPS（新規追加）
item.description: You’re thrown into the chaos of urban warfare, where every corner hides danger and every mistake is fatal. With a body camera perspective, no HUD, and no second chances, survival depends on your reflexes, precision, and courage.
item.content:encoded:
You’re thrown into the chaos of urban warfare, where every corner hides danger and every mistake is fatal. With a body camera perspective, no HUD, and no second chances, survival depends on your reflexes, precision, and courage.

item.title: Lusófona Games Collection 2025（新規追加）
item.description: Lusófona Games Collection 2025 brings you six unique, student and staff made games from Lusófona University. Dive into creative prototypes packed with passion, gameplay innovation, and behind-the-scenes commentary from the next generation of game developers!
item.content:encoded:
Lusófona Games Collection 2025 brings you six unique, student and staff made games from Lusófona University. Dive into creative prototypes packed with passion, gameplay innovation, and behind-the-scenes commentary from the next generation of game developers!

item.title: Waifu Rancher 2（新規追加）
item.description: A sexy, fully-voiced and illustrated visual novel and dating sim for anime enjoyers featuring a myriad of interactive waifus. You'll want to replay the your favorite scenes with your favorite anime girls again and again. You certainly will not regret enjoying Waifu Rancher 2.
item.content:encoded:
A sexy, fully-voiced and illustrated visual novel and dating sim for anime enjoyers featuring a myriad of interactive waifus. You'll want to replay the your favorite scenes with your favorite anime girls again and again. You certainly will not regret enjoying Waifu Rancher 2.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Make Watermelon（新規追加）
item.description: The game is based on the theme of watermelon. You only need to collide the same fruits to synthesize. Three special props: Hammer: One click, you can crush any kind of fruit; Bomb: You can eliminate two adjacent fruits at the same time; Color ball: can eliminate all fruits of the same color.
item.content:encoded:
The game is based on the theme of watermelon. You only need to collide the same fruits to synthesize. Three special props: Hammer: One click, you can crush any kind of fruit; Bomb: You can eliminate two adjacent fruits at the same time; Color ball: can eliminate all fruits of the same color.

item.title: Dead Gods Realm: Morar（新規追加）
item.description: Narrative RPG inspired by works of H.P. Lovecraft, celtic myths, rapiers and gunpowder. World awaits the Arrival of unknown foes. It needs a hero who would stop the menace. Or he won't. He may even join them. Only you shall decide who would Morar become.
item.content:encoded:
Narrative RPG inspired by works of H.P. Lovecraft, celtic myths, rapiers and gunpowder. World awaits the Arrival of unknown foes. It needs a hero who would stop the menace. Or he won't. He may even join them. Only you shall decide who would Morar become.

item.title: Mission Rumble（新規追加）
item.description: A chaotic 2D platform fighter where you don’t fight with fists, but with randomly spawning weapons like rocket launchers and M16s. Battle online against friends or strangers and use crazy power-ups to boost yourself or sabotage your opponents.
item.content:encoded:
A chaotic 2D platform fighter where you don’t fight with fists, but with randomly spawning weapons like rocket launchers and M16s. Battle online against friends or strangers and use crazy power-ups to boost yourself or sabotage your opponents.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Nightcrawler（新規追加）
item.description: A neon arcade about road and music. Ride your motorcycle on an endless highway and pass clipping zones to keep the rhythm: the road speeds up, the gaps get tighter, one mistake ends the run. Meditative yet challenging.
item.content:encoded:
A neon arcade about road and music. Ride your motorcycle on an endless highway and pass clipping zones to keep the rhythm: the road speeds up, the gaps get tighter, one mistake ends the run. Meditative yet challenging.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Paw Pop Fish（新規追加）
item.description: Play as a playful kitty paw in this idle desktop game! Pick from 14 preset skins or create your very own unique look, then explore 10 charming environments like rivers, streams, beaches, and pools. Switch day and night, go transparent on your desktop, and climb global or friends leaderboards.
item.content:encoded:
Play as a playful kitty paw in this idle desktop game! Pick from 14 preset skins or create your very own unique look, then explore 10 charming environments like rivers, streams, beaches, and pools. Switch day and night, go transparent on your desktop, and climb global or friends leaderboards.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Kindvixen's Demo（新規追加）
item.description: There are places for you, all around, in this world and in another’s arms. Find one in the mysterious town of Seabreeze in this visual novel about the quaint, mysterious little town. Searching about, one might find love, community...and deeper secrets hidden beneath.
item.content:encoded:
There are places for you, all around, in this world and in another’s arms. Find one in the mysterious town of Seabreeze in this visual novel about the quaint, mysterious little town. Searching about, one might find love, community...and deeper secrets hidden beneath.

item.title: Entities Declassified: Winter Hungers（新規追加）
item.description: An amateur TV crew disappeared during a 1997 shoot in Ontario’s deep woods. Step into that frostbitten night in the chilling first case in Entities Declassified, untangle their fate, and learn what silenced the crew.

item.title: Tower of Wizard（新規追加）
item.description: Tower of Wizard is a survival rogue-lite where you ascend a cursed tower filled with monstrous foes and fallen wizards. Collect powerful relics, craft broken builds, and uncover the mystery that waits at the top floor.
item.content:encoded:
Tower of Wizard is a survival rogue-lite where you ascend a cursed tower filled with monstrous foes and fallen wizards. Collect powerful relics, craft broken builds, and uncover the mystery that waits at the top floor.

item.title: Cats Visiting Wild West（新規追加）
item.description: Explore charming Wild West scenes and find hidden cats hiding in saloons, canyons, and steam trains. Relax, search, and collect them all!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: KIETA MEMORY – The Girl from the Stars（新規追加）
item.description: A romantic sci-fi visual novel starting in 1992. Life with your girlfriend Azuki, the girl from the stars, is fun, but when cosmic conspiracies threaten your love and all of Earth, you and your friends have to embark on an epic journey through time and space and rewrite your future.
item.content:encoded:
A romantic sci-fi visual novel starting in 1992. Life with your girlfriend Azuki, the girl from the stars, is fun, but when cosmic conspiracies threaten your love and all of Earth, you and your friends have to embark on an epic journey through time and space and rewrite your future.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Cosmic Corps（新規追加）
item.description: Cosmic Corps is an action roguelike with bullet hell elements. Blast, slash, and laser hostile lifeforms as you dimension hop to freedom across a series of planets. Loot everything you can to arm yourself against the entity lurking deep within the Rift.
item.content:encoded:
Cosmic Corps is an action roguelike with bullet hell elements. Blast, slash, and laser hostile lifeforms as you dimension hop to freedom across a series of planets. Loot everything you can to arm yourself against the entity lurking deep within the Rift.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Summer Reunion（新規追加）
item.description: A visual novel with more than 50 illustrations to color the story. Summer" has suddenly disappeared from a certain town. A boy returns to the town where the seasons have stopped, and is reunited with his former friends. What awaits him after he overcomes the cost of his wish?
item.content:encoded:
A visual novel with more than 50 illustrations to color the story. Summer" has suddenly disappeared from a certain town. A boy returns to the town where the seasons have stopped, and is reunited with his former friends. What awaits him after he overcomes the cost of his wish?

Steamでページを開く

item.title: RogueStacks（新規追加）
item.description: A resource-gathering Tower Defense and Roguelike with card-based gameplay set in medieval times. Collect coins to upgrade your villagers and unlock new cards.
item.content:encoded:
A resource-gathering Tower Defense and Roguelike with card-based gameplay set in medieval times. Collect coins to upgrade your villagers and unlock new cards.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: 终焉与珑同行（新規追加）
item.description: "Alongside the End" is a visual novel about quiet days. No magic, no twists—just two people spending time together. They eat, talk, argue, and laugh. Nothing really happens, yet something stays—a glance, a word, a memory. It doesn’t try to impress. It only asks: stay a little longer. Just once more.
item.content:encoded:
"Alongside the End" is a visual novel about quiet days. No magic, no twists—just two people spending time together. They eat, talk, argue, and laugh. Nothing really happens, yet something stays—a glance, a word, a memory. It doesn’t try to impress. It only asks: stay a little longer. Just once more.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Catto Pew Pew!（新規追加）
item.description: Send everyone flying in this over-the-top shooter where crazy physics meets hilarious proximity chat. There’s nothing like it—join the chaos for free!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: TEKNOKRAT（新規追加）
item.description: Enter the city of Nu-Vika as a cyborg repairman in TEKNOKRAT, a thriller romance visual novel. a vehicular shadow of the colossus boss rush. pilot a hovercraft against increasing otherworldly colossal entities in a desolate future. weave through their attacks, study their timing and land the killing blow. fulfill your delusions of grandeur in this sandy world. there is no hope for you here.

item.title: 阿波罗奏鸣曲 - Apollo Sonata（新規追加）
item.description: 传说中，夜晚的校园充满了怪谈和诅咒：血水厕所、乱码黑板、空中的冥府之路，以及天台上自动弹奏的钢琴。游戏三个周目中，你将分别扮演缪、杜松子和沫沫三位学生，在夜晚的校园探索灵异背后的真相。在笑与泪的探险中，少女们的友情能否成为解开的钥匙？
item.content:encoded:
传说中，夜晚的校园充满了怪谈和诅咒：血水厕所、乱码黑板、空中的冥府之路，以及天台上自动弹奏的钢琴。游戏三个周目中，你将分别扮演缪、杜松子和沫沫三位学生，在夜晚的校园探索灵异背后的真相。在笑与泪的探险中，少女们的友情能否成为解开的钥匙？

item.title: Descendant（新規追加）
item.description: Descendant is a love letter to the 00s era of survival horror. Play as Blake Cage, a sharp-tongued operative of Vector Six - humanity’s last hope against the darkness. Unravel a gripping, lore-rich mystery of ancient immortals, bloodthirsty vampires, and the desperate struggle of mankind.
item.content:encoded:
Descendant is a love letter to the 00s era of survival horror. Play as Blake Cage, a sharp-tongued operative of Vector Six - humanity’s last hope against the darkness. Unravel a gripping, lore-rich mystery of ancient immortals, bloodthirsty vampires, and the desperate struggle of mankind.

item.title: Fallfate: Impulsive Plinko（新規追加）
item.description: Fallfate is short, action-packed roguelike plinko. Discs’ paths are deterministic; defy them with spin. Parry enemies and shift risks into advantages. Gamble through chaotic worlds and face towering bosses. Die and refine with each fall, until you master the true nature of fate.
item.content:encoded:
Fallfate is short, action-packed roguelike plinko. Discs’ paths are deterministic; defy them with spin. Parry enemies and shift risks into advantages. Gamble through chaotic worlds and face towering bosses. Die and refine with each fall, until you master the true nature of fate.
